participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Michael loves to explore new places and meet new people. He enjoys social gatherings and has a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: I am looking for a place that is close to my family and friends, where I can enjoy a good beer. My major was American literature and education. I had a small party with my friends. I am an international businessman. I have a very toned body.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Caring and creative, Sarah has a deep love for animals and enjoys experimenting in the kitchen. She is currently navigating her career path with a positive outlook.
participant_2.background: I'm not sure what a fortune teller could tell me, but I'm sure they'd be impressed by my talents and my love for my family. I made sure to take my dog on a walk every day while I was on vacation. My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union. I've been in a bit of a funk since my house was robbed, but creating new recipes always helps me feel better. I like to train dogs.

content.text: Hi, how has your day been?
It was great! I just finished training my dog to sit.
Nice! I love dogs! I have a couple of chihuahuas.
Oh, that's cool! I'm kind of a dog person. I always take my dog for a walk every day.
I wish I could get out more with my dogs, but I'm so busy with work. I'm an international business man.
Oh, that's really cool! What's your favorite part of the job?
I love traveling and meeting new people. I also love learning about different cultures.
That sounds really interesting! I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet. I just graduated with a degree in American Literature and Education.
Oh, that's a great degree! You could teach English or work in a library.
I've been thinking about teaching, but I'm not sure if I want to be stuck in a classroom all day.
Well, there are a lot of different teaching jobs out there. You could teach online or even teach abroad.
I hadn't thought about that! I might look into teaching abroad.
I think you'd be great at it! You're obviously a people person and you're very passionate about education.
Thanks! I appreciate that. I'm still not sure what I want to do, but I'm glad I have some options
